links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..900
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (-11,12).
formula: a(n) = a(n-1) + q^(n-1) = (q^n - 1) / (q - 1).G.f.: x/((1 - x)*(1 + 12*x)). - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Oct 22 2012a(n) = -11*a(n-1) +12*a(n-2). - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Oct 22 2012
maple: a:=n->sum ((-12)^j, j=0..n): seq(a(n), n=0..25);# - _Zerinvary Lajos_, Dec 16 2008
prog: (Sage) [gaussian_binomial(n,1,-12) for n in xrange(1,18)] # - _Zerinvary Lajos_, May 28 2009(MAGMA) I:=[1,-11]; [n le 2 select I[n] else -11*Self(n-1)+12*Self(n-2): n in [1..30]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Oct 22 2012(PARI) a(n)=(1-(-12)^n)/13 \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Sep 24 2015
